document_data.name: Deinonychus
document_data.mainbody: A '''deinonychus''' ({{Pronounce|day|in|o|NY|kuss|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|26}}}}), also known as a '''razortalon''' by the inhabitants of [[High Moor]], and as a '''raptor''' on the [[Malatran Plateau]], was a carnivorous species of [[dinosaur]] in the family of dinosaurs known as dromaeosaurs.
document_data.Description: The deinonychus was a larger cousin of the [[velociraptor]]. They roughly stood about as tall as a [[human]].
document_data.Biology: Deinonychuses could run as fast as the average [[horse]].
document_data.Behavior: Deinonychus was a rather cunning creature.
document_data.Combat: These dinosaurs liked to leap upon their prey, pinning them down with their claws and powerful rear talons. They then would often attempt to feed upon their prey while it was still alive.

Sub-Species.Ti-khana: A species created by [[yuan-ti]] experimentation and cross-breeding, these were deinonychuses that exhibited traits of [[snake]]s.<ref>{{Cite web/The Winding Serpent: Ti-Khana}}

Ecology.Habitats:
These dinosaurs were most commonly found in the jungles of [[Chult]], though they were also known to inhabit the [[Serpent Hills]] and the [[Stonelands]]. In the latter they hibernated in deep rifts near [[earth node]]s and volcanic flows. They never raced along the heights of the Stonelands or ventured far from it, as they feared being eaten by [[dragon]]s, [[darkenbeast|dark horror]]s, or [[Zhent]] [[foulwing]]s.<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2006)/Dinosaurs in the Stonelands}}

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some could be found in the [[Forbidden Plateau (divine realm)|Forbidden Plateau]].
Ecology.Relationships: In the land of Chult, the [[Batiri]] [[Shattered Spear tribe]] trained deinonychuses to act as watchdogs.

document_data.Notable Deinonychuses:
* [[Jungle Princess]], a racing dinosaur from [[Port Nyanzaru]].
* [[Knuckles]], the pet deinonychus of [[Bosco Daggerhand]].
* [[Yushai]], the [[animal companion]] of [[Umoja]].
